skip_qc.description: skip all QC steps: true, false

build_references.description: Specifies which analysis type for the pipeline - either build references or analyse data:true, false

genomes_base.description: S3 path to reference folder. Default is set to s3://cb-oncology/references/rnafusion_references

starfusion_build.description: If set, starfusion references are built from scratch instead of downloaded: true, false

all.description: Build or run all references/analyses: true, false

arriba.description: Build or run arriba references/analyses: true, false

arriba_ref_cytobands.description: S3 path to arriba reference cytobands

fusioncatcher.description: Build or run fusioncatcher references/analyses: true, false

fusioncatcher_limitSjdbInsertNsj.description: Use limitSjdbInsertNsj with int for fusioncatcher

starfusion.description: Build or run starfusion references/analyses: true, false

trim.description: Preform trimming of reads, default: false

fasta.description: S3 Path to FASTA genome file.

fai.description: S3 Path to FASTA index file.
